class.name: VideoStream
class.description: Base resource type for all video streams. Classes that derive from [VideoStream] can all be used as resource types to play back videos in [VideoStreamPlayer].

method.name: _instantiate_playback
method.description: Called when the video starts playing, to initialize and return a subclass of [VideoStreamPlayback].

members.member: The video file path or URI that this [VideoStream] resource handles. For [VideoStreamTheora], this filename should be an Ogg Theora video file with the [code].ogv[/code] extension.
